Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory126.png'}
{3: 'The shaking on top of the train persisted for while.'}
{3: 'Sophia supports Changyu with her mechanical arms while trying to maintain balance as she ventures forward in the carriages.'}
{3: 'But before long, she sees Gray Raven retreating from the roof on the same steps she was just on.'}
{3: 'After doing a double-take, she finally believes what she is seeing—Gray Raven was missing two Constructs.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "...I can still sense Lucia's and Lee's signals so they are not in any immediate danger...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'I think I understand your situation.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Changyu's condition... It's getting worse! What happened?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Overexerting himself in the fight just now made his injuries worse.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'His circulation system module has been damaged and is losing vital fluids. He needs more precise maintenance.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'I need to replace some essential repair modules.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'There are quite a lot of mechanical equipment lying around, maybe you can use some of those?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Those are originally the maintenance machines on this train. I can use their parts for my external mechanic arms.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Changyu already fainted...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I may be overstepping, but I need to connect and monitor his M.I.N.D.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I can also relieve some of his pain.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: '...You can do that?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Then, please do.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "I'll try my best to collect the maintenance modules.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Commencing connection to Changyu's M.I.N.D. now for monitoring. No need to worry about him...", 4: '2'}
